website_summaries.verdict: A vegetarian cat and dog food that's full of helpful nutrients and low in fats.
pros: Effective way to keep your cat well hydrated
Veggie mix can be enjoyed on its own or mixed in with regular cat food to give it a healthy boost
Free of preservatives, salt, and fillers
cons: May be difficult to transition meat-eating cats to this food

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am aware there have been previous issues. But I spoke to my nutritionist and she had done some research about the company and also spoke to the owner. So on her recommendation I gave it to my overweight dog and let me tell you we have had a happy chihuahua and mom. Lost 1.5 lbs and loves the taste. She get her kibbles in the evening, but this keeps her full and hydrated beautifully during the day. Along with her water intake.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Confused only 12 cans vegetarian
customer_reviews.text: I am confused...the other customers who bought this said it came with 24 cans for 30 something dollars, and I received only 12 cans...was it a mistake?
customer_reviews.author: jessica joy

customer_reviews.title: MY MIN PINS EAT THIS LIKE THEY HAVEN"T EATEN IN WEEKS!
customer_reviews.text: Both of our little Min Pins cannot get enough of this great healthy food! Low in fat which our older baby requires due to a recent health scare, we are now using it in place of Royal Canin Low Fat Gastro-Intestinal canned food. They haven't gotten bored with this and nearly jump out of their skins when I take it out at feeding time! It's also helping with their constipation issues which is common to the breed, no longer have to add pumpkin to their food to soften stool, this has completely taken care of that problem! Will feed this to them exclusively from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Walk

customer_reviews.title: Vege good for pancreatic issues
customer_reviews.text: The food seems drier in the cans than it was the first time I ordered it. Did I originally order one exclusive to dogs? Never saw it was for cats too before.
customer_reviews.author: Grendel

customer_reviews.title: 14.5 yr old chihuahua loves it
customer_reviews.text: my 14 yr old chihuahua was seriously declining, and had a skin ailment and bald spots. i thought i'd try changing her diet. adding this veg dinner was one of the changes i made. i also started giving her a bit of raw organic chicken (frozen medallions from the pet store). she loves this canned food and attacks it eagerly. she loves her medallions, too. in the last 6 months she seems to have regained her youth. she plays more and eats heartily and has her thick silky coat back.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Glough

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves this food and it adds fiber to her diet. I split it up and feed it over several days (half in fridge, half in freezer) for a nine pound dog, mixing with her dry food I get 6 days of feeding with 1 can. she really enjoys it and I like giving her veggies as much as possible
customer_reviews.author: ipodder in houston

customer_reviews.title: Cans bent or damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product so I ordered 2 cases but over 1/2 the cans were bent up or smashed in to where I can’t use them - extremely disappointing especially for the cost
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: It keeps the flavors interesting and has supported their good health for a combined 8 years now
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs a combination of this brand, Avoderm Vegetarian (their least favorite), Nature's Recipe vegetarian stew, and Natural Balance vegetarian canned foods. It keeps the flavors interesting and has supported their good health for a combined 8 years now.
customer_reviews.author: waimanu

customer_reviews.title: VEGAN is good to not value one life over another
customer_reviews.text: Cats don't totally dig it, must mix it with some other foods to dilute and use less cruel factory-farmed animal products for our cats.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, but dogs won't eat
customer_reviews.text: This has wonderful ingredients listed on the can which is why I chose to purchase it. However, my dogs (a standard poodle and a pomeranian) won't eat it. So those wonderful ingredients don't do them much good.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda C.

customer_reviews.title: Def. a top product.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs LOVE this product- 3 dogs, and they cannot get enough! Really happy to cut down on the animal killing and have a good product. Wish it was organic.
customer_reviews.author: Taking Action!

customer_reviews.title: Food great....Cans often dented
customer_reviews.text: Our Havanese is a very fussy eater and this was the first food he would eat fairly consistently. I unusually add some chopped chicken for extra protein. The only problem I frequently encounter is with the cans...often they are dented (store or shipped direct to house).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great veg. dog food and my dog LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Great veg. dog food and my dog LOVES it!!!-I also love the fact it is made here in the states, otherwise I would not have purchased. My dog has been eating this for a few years now, great product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: susan8047

customer_reviews.title: my Shepherd actually enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd actually liked this mixed in her food. It is a good rotation food for her. At some point, she actually ate an entire can (no fish based kibble) all by itself. I like that my dog is now getting more veggies in her diet.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 3 dog foods my dog likes
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't really like dog food, and he really prefers fruits and vegetables. This was one of 3 canned dog foods he likes. The pet store I went to went out of business, so I'm glad I can now buy on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DVD Watcher

customer_reviews.title: My cat won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get my cat on a vegan diet but she won't eat it. I have the cans here untouched.
customer_reviews.author: Designing One

customer_reviews.title: My dog  loves this
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews people complain about the price my dog loves it and that's all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Kristine black

customer_reviews.title: RIP off! More expensive than pet shop
customer_reviews.text: I was told when ordering that ld be getting 24 cans. I only got 12! No bargain. Never again. And l found out there was deadly horse killing drug in the meat variety a few years ago. Beware pet lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ruhl

customer_reviews.title: To Dry to Be Eaten
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vegetarian pet food but it's so dry neither the cat nor the dog will touch it. No wonder the makers don't allow unhappy customers to return the product. I feel cheated out of $38.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Fagerlie

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: After some research I found this canned food. I don't know what's best for every dog, but I know what works for MY dog...and she loves this. I found this to be one of the best rated canned veggie foods on the market. Sadly, my dog has a protein allergy and suffers horribly from ear infections and itchy paws if she gets ANY animal protein. Just one treat can set off a reaction, poor thing. She loves this, I can hide medicine in it (she hates pills), and provide some meal variety. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: PrinczBma

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs won't eat it without mixing it with meat. :(
customer_reviews.author: s. tucci

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. He might be allergic to chicken and other meats but he does great on this.
customer_reviews.author: Celticmusl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it didn't have eggs but my cats love this food!
customer_reviews.author: Chandi

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this. I give them meat
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. I give them meat, but don't make it all they get. They get veggies and grains half of the time too.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product as usual
customer_reviews.text: Great product as usual. Hard to find veggie food for my old 7lb sickly pup and she likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: lwwhite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great food to mix with easily digestible proteins for dogs with liver problems!
customer_reviews.author: R. Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My pitty loves it. No complaints. Seems a bit pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only Veggies my dog will eat and boy howdy will she eat these veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with service.Price is lowest in my area. Arrived on time and I did not have to go out in snow for dog food.Gotta love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Flores

customer_reviews.title: Evangers a find on Amazon.  Dog owners who appreciate quality should try this brand.
customer_reviews.text: My dog needs a low protein diet. This lowers her daily intake of protein. Still with a dented can that had to be tossed out the value healthwise is worth the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: Great food! It is very hard to find vegan cat food choices, so when I saw this, I grabbed it. I really hope that more vegan and vegetarian cat food selections will become available in both canned and dry food. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: i have a 14 yr old chihuahua. i feed her evanger's canned organic turkey w/ potato and carrots dinner and evanger's canned low fat vegetarian, about 1/2 each in the morning and a clove of roasted garlic. at night she gets a small quantity of raw organic chicken, some homemade sweet potato, chick peas and brown rice, and a bit of flax meal. she is a lively, cheerful healthy dog with a lovely coat and bright eyes. of course, i don't know if she is thriving because of her diet, or in spite of it.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Glough

customer_reviews.title: dog food
customer_reviews.text: this food was as described, and betty really went for the great taste, we will be ordering more in the future,thanks
customer_reviews.author: ann fisher

customer_reviews.title: This has been my dog's favorite vegan canned food.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and very good food for my pets. My dogs really enjoyed it and out of all of the canned vegan food my dogs have preferred Evangers. We will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Happy houndage and happy care givers!
customer_reviews.text: Our three bassets LOVE this as a topper on their kibble. We are happy that no animals had to suffer for this product to be made.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shimp

customer_reviews.title: trying to find a vegeatarian dog/cat foor
customer_reviews.text: I am a vegetarian and although I know that cats and dogs are meat eaters I try to look where I can to prevent animal cruelty. I really wish I could like this food but neither the cat nor the dog would eat this food. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

product_meta.title: Evanger's Grain-Free Single Protein Game Meats for Dogs & Cats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Vegetarian| Size:12.8 ozGreat for a hypo-allergenic diet may help with pancreatitis weight loss or weight management or when a pet needs a reduced protein diet.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
